Posts.Content: Aug 10, 2011 11:28PM lindiA wrote: Article Source: S.C. man denied breast cancer coverage by Medicaid I couldn't believe that these medic people wouldn't cover his illness just because he's a man! He's got breast cancer for crying out loud! People nowadays can be so sexist. Breast Cancer is a serious issue indeed. I've met people with such condition and it's really hard for them to cope. The important thing is that we should be aware of this, and we should help each other in any way possible. We should all be willing to help, each of us should fight for a cause, men and women alike.
Posts.Title: Genetic link and physical appearance? Lavender250 slousha
